overview: Attorney Stephen J. Gross has been in private practice in Los Angeles since 1980. Before opening his own office, he worked for a small Beverly Hills law firm setting up California companies for foreign based immigration clients while also preparing the required documents for the client’s purchase of a business or real estate in California. Today our practice is devoted to working with various clients in need of asset protection planning, college financial aid planning through entity formation, legal representaion for escrow transactions, real estate document, contract review and drafting, start up business representation including California corporation and LLC creation, as well as representation in litigation cases.
